author: STEPHEN McGRATH
title: Concern grows over traffickers targeting Ukrainian refugees
description: SIRET, Romania (AP) — One man was detained in Poland suspected of raping a 19-year-old refugee he’d lured with offers of shelter after she fled war-torn Ukraine. Another was overheard promising work and a room to a 16-year-old girl before authorities interven…
